summary:
SV - The Outdoors is a mod that changes the lighting and color of the weather to give Skyrim a new look.  If you are tired of seeing Skyrim\'s old weather and want to see Skyrim with a new look, then this is a mod worth trying out.  This mod will completely change all environments that are outside.

These environments include:
- Falkreath Hold
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Visuals: The Outdoors (SV - The Outdoors)
Version 1.4

===========================================================================
LINKS
===========================================================================

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=15146&searchtext=

If you prefer my mod to be brighter, darker, colorful, realistic, etc.  I would recommend using this with my mod.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13049
(Special Thanks to Kan for telling me about this mod)

===========================================================================
OTHER MODS MADE BY ME
===========================================================================
Nexus Links:
Skyrim Visuals The Indoors:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17242
Skyrim Outdoors Visual Enhancement
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23853

Steam Workshop version of the mod:
Skyrim Visuals The Indoors
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=72465536
Skyrim Outdoor Visual Enhancement
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=94838266

===========================================================================
IMPORTANT:
===========================================================================

- I\'m not responisble for any kind of damages related to this mod
- Download at your own risk.

===========================================================================
ABOUT THE MOD
===========================================================================

SV - The Outdoors is a mod that changes the lighting and color of the weather to give Skyrim a new look.  If you are tired of seeing Skyrim\'s old weather and want to see Skyrim with a new look, then this is a mod worth trying out.  This mod will completely change all environments that are outside.

These environments include:
- Falkreath Hold
- Sea of Ghosts
- The Rift
- Hjaalmarch
- The Reach
- Haafingar
- The Pale
- Winterhold
- Whiterun Hold
- Eastmarsh

* There should be no performance drop

============================================================================
NOTE:
============================================================================

*You can use the Realistic Lighting mod if you load SV - The Outdoors after Realistic Lighting  
(I don\'t recommended it, because it doesn\'t look that great in my opinion.  It\'s up to you).

*The video is slightly out of date (Falkreath and Whiterun during the day were improved along with any areas that used those weather ID\'s) most of the video should give you a pretty good idea on what the mod looks reguardless of it being slightly out of date.  I will upload a new video sometime around v1.4.

============================================================================
FUTURE UPDATE
============================================================================

v1.5

============================================================================
FUTURE MODS
============================================================================

==//==//==//==//==//==//==//==//==//==
S.I.V.E (Skyrim Indoor Visual Enhancement)
==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==

Description (may change):  This mod will improve the SV - The Indoors mod by modifying the imagespaces.  This mod will also improve the vanilla version even if you don\'t have SV - The Indoors mod installed.

==\\\\==\\\\==\\\\==
